common.framework.dsb

接口 DynamicServiceBean

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractServiceBean

    public interface DynamicServiceBean
    Bean class of the dynamic service, all dynamic service must implement this interface
    作者:
    David Yuan

    • 方法概要

      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      start this dynamic service
